title: Trying to reconnect

With that kind of error message, there's a pretty decent chance that your network is having a hard time maintaining it's connection to our matchmaking servers. Before you hop into a ranked match, let's make sure that you won't get those reconnecting errors while in the game. 

We should be able to smooth this out by checking up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Make sure to test those changes in a custom or practice game first, and let me know how it helps!
